scripts.ask-file: mkdir -p .selected && ls slides | grep .md$ | nl -w2 -s'. ' > .selected/.slide-list && cat .selected/.slide-list && read -p 'Select number and enter: ' NUM && ENTRY=$(sed -n ${NUM}p .selected/.slide-list | awk '{print $2}') && SLIDE_NAME=$(basename $ENTRY .md) && echo slides/$ENTRY > .selected/.selected-slide && echo $SLIDE_NAME > .selected/.selected-slide-name
scripts.env-check: echo 'üîç Checking environment...' && if [ -z "$S3_BUCKET" ]; then echo '‚ùå S3_BUCKET not set in .env'; exit 1; fi && echo '‚úÖ S3_BUCKET: '$S3_BUCKET && if ! command -v s3cmd &> /dev/null; then echo '‚ùå s3cmd not installed'; exit 1; fi && echo '‚úÖ s3cmd installed' && s3cmd ls s3://$S3_BUCKET > /dev/null 2>&1 && echo '‚úÖ S3 bucket accessible' || (echo '‚ùå S3 bucket not accessible' && exit 1) && echo 'üöÄ Environment ready for deployment!'
scripts.dev: pnpm run ask-file && ENTRY=$(cat .selected/.selected-slide) && pnpm slidev --open "$ENTRY"
scripts.build: pnpm run ask-file && ENTRY=$(cat .selected/.selected-slide) && SLIDE_NAME=$(cat .selected/.selected-slide-name) && pnpm slidev build "$ENTRY" --out $PWD/dist/$SLIDE_NAME --base /$SLIDE_NAME/
scripts.export: pnpm run ask-file && ENTRY=$(cat .selected/.selected-slide) && SLIDE_NAME=$(cat .selected/.selected-slide-name) && pnpm slidev export "$ENTRY" --out $PWD/dist/$SLIDE_NAME --base /$SLIDE_NAME/
scripts.deploy-slide: pnpm env-check && pnpm run ask-file && SLIDE_NAME=$(cat .selected/.selected-slide-name) && s3cmd put --recursive dist/$SLIDE_NAME/ s3://$S3_BUCKET/$SLIDE_NAME/
scripts.delete-slide: pnpm env-check && read -p 'Enter slide name to delete from S3: ' SLIDE_NAME && s3cmd del --recursive s3://$S3_BUCKET/$SLIDE_NAME/
scripts.deploy-home: pnpm env-check && s3cmd put --recursive dist/index.html s3://$S3_BUCKET/
